Replace.Text: Well done, traveler. I want to hear what your wish is.
"But the direction of the wind will change." [NEWLINE] "From now on, take my blessings and live more calmly." [NEWLINE] "One day, it will blow in a brighter direction."
Freedom to enter foreign countries without open borders
As the city is unlocked, the attack power will gradually increase.
Municipal (divine right, divine right of kings, ideology, cold war) respectively +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power.
{LOC_PROMOTION_RANGER_DESCRIPTION} +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting in the rainforest or woods.
{LOC_PROMOTION_ALPINE_DESCRIPTION}+5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting on hills.
Does not suffer combat debuffs when injured. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending.
The ebb and flow of brilliance
At the end of each turn (even after moving or attacking), automatically restore health. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
Wendy's Mond triumphs on culture and faith

Mond led by Wendy is a civilization that focuses on culture and beliefs. Using the beliefs brought by high-charm plots and tavern bonuses, recruit more cheap and earlier cultural transmission units, bards. On the basis of the tourism performance of the future, it is easier to obtain cultural victories

Wendy was originally an elemental spirit among the thousand winds of Mond. In Old Mond, Wendy met a boy. The boy led the people to rebel against the tyrant Dekarapian who ruled them. In the end, the tyrant fell and the boy died in battle. Wendy gains power to become the new god, Barbatos the Demon God. Andreus, the demon god who has been fighting with Dekarapian, also chose to leave because of his own characteristics. The Demon God War ended, and the Demon God Barbatos became the God of Wind, one of the seven rulers in the world. In order to commemorate her friend, the first thing Wendy did after gaining the supernatural power was to reshape her body with the appearance of a boy, played her friend's favorite harp, and walked in the world with this boy's body ever since.

Afterwards, Barbatos-Wendy imparted his wisdom to the Mond people, modified the terrain of the current Mond area, migrated from Old Mond (now the ruins of Fenglong) and settled down, setting up many festivals and celebrations. Later, Wendy left Mond because she didn't want to become a new tyrant, making Mond an autonomous free state. After the demon war ended, Fengshen went to Liyue, a neighboring country, to invite Yanshen to taste dandelion wine. Since then, the original seven gods have met in Liyue many times.

About 1600 after the completion of New Mond, the nobles headed by the Lawrence family took control of Mond, and Wendy woke up again in response to the prayers of his followers. Walking in Mond City as a bard, I found that the atmosphere in the city was extremely depressing. On the day of the Badminton Festival, I played "Song of the Wind", which has not been played for a long time, to an Apple vendor, and was warned by the vendor, "Don't touch that shuttlecock." During the celebration, I found out about the absurd and brutal behavior of the nobleman, stepped forward to snatch the badminton to play with the nobleman, was chased and killed by the soldiers, met Vanessa on the way to escape, and got her cover. Vanessa was arrested for offending the nobles. Wendy got the cell key that night and entered the cell to talk to Vanessa. Wendy wants to escape Mund with Vanessa and her people. But Vanessa said that her people have forgotten the meaning of "freedom", and they have to participate in the duel on the second day anyway to awaken the people's sense of resistance and freedom, otherwise they will only be shackled by another power. .

The next day, the nobles shamelessly drove all the Vanessa clan out of the city, demanding that they defeat the dragon Uzzah, and shot and killed the retreating people with arrows. At this time, Wendy suddenly appeared, guided the power of the wind to make Vanessa hit the dragon, and used divine power to order the dragon to retreat. At this time, Wendy asked to write Vanessa into the poem, and was agreed, saying that this would be a new chapter with the Vanessa family as the protagonist. In the end, Lawrence was asked to follow the rules and hand over control of Mond. In addition, by forging Morax's signature to create the "Secret Treaty of Leeward", a large number of soldiers rebelled, and together with Vanessa, they overthrew the aristocratic rule. The followers of the wind god Barbatos form the Guardians of the Four Winds. Fengshen left again.

500 years ago, all the gods, including the god of wind, came together and destroyed Kerriya. The Calamity of Kerriya spread throughout Teyvat. The dragon Durin and the dark wave of monsters attacked Mond together, and the Zephyr Knights fought hard. Fengshen and his family member Twalin fought against Dulin together, and finally cut Dulin off the snow mountain. The wind god and the wind dragon corrupted by the poisonous blood of the dragon fell into a deep sleep.

Mond, located in the northeast of Tivat continent, is known as the "city-state of wind and pastoral songs". Believing in Barbatos, the god of the wind, it is one of the seven earthly kingdoms in the Tivat continent, and it is also the starting point for travelers in the game to find their lost family members. Between the mountains and the vast plains, the wind of freedom blows over the fruit wine lake with the smell of dandelions, sending Barbatos' blessing and grace to Mond City, which is located on the island in the middle of the lake.

At least 3,000 years ago, Dekarapian, the demon god of gale, established a civilization in the ruins of today's wind dragon, which is now called "Old Mond". At that time, the land of Mond was covered by vast ice and snow, and human beings had to seek the protection of the demon god. Dekarapian built the capital around the ruins of the wind dragon, and surrounded the capital with a towering wind wall to prevent external threats such as blizzards.

2600 years ago, Andreus, another demon god in the Mond area, declared war on Dekarapian, but failed to break through the wind wall of Old Mond, and Dekarapian did not seem to attack from Old Mond, the war deadlocked. At this time in Old Mond, Dekarapian implemented the autocratic rule of slavery. Dekarapian had a surly personality and was withdrawn. people's dissatisfaction. Starting with a red-haired knight, codenamed "Flower of the Wind", some Mond people were secretly preparing to resist. They used songs and chants to communicate with the signal, and were suppressed by the old Mond rulers. Disappointed with Dekalapian's complacency, other Munds, led by a Dekalapian subordinate, decided to leave Old Mund, but struggled to survive in the harsh environment beyond the Wind Wall. Gurnhilde, the leader's daughter, was protected by the wind spirit and developed a belief in the wind. At a certain point in time, an unknown bard met a wind elf named Wendy. At that time, Wendy was just one of the countless wind elves in the north of Mond, and had no great power.

Under the guidance of Wendy, the nameless bard, the refugees led by Gurnhild, the Lawrence family led by Vanilla Rui, the red-haired knight, and Amos, the lover of Decalapian, launched an uprising with the Old Monds and overthrew the After breaking the autocratic rule of Dekarapian, Dekarapian also died on the tower. Wendy inherited the power of Dekarapian, and with Gunnhild's support, she became a new demon god named "Barbatos", the wind god. Barbatos used divine power to reshape himself according to the bard's appearance, and used divine wind to blow away the blizzard that covered the land of Mond, and then reshaped the terrain of Mond so that the warm and humid sea breeze could blow into Mond. Guide the First Men to build New Mond City in Wine Lake. The refugees later formed the Gunnhild family, and the Lawrence family opened up New Mond City. The unknown bard and Amos died in the uprising, and the red-haired knight left after the uprising was successful, and his whereabouts are unknown.

Andreus found that the fierce north wind can only bring disasters, but cannot nourish life, nor can he lead people to create a happy life, so he is not qualified to be the future ruler of the world. Form guards Mond. With the death of Andreus, Barbatos becoming one of the seven rulers of the world, and the establishment of the new Mond aristocratic system, all the demon wars in the Mond area have come to an end. Barbatos did not want to be a tyrant like Dekarapian, and decided to make Mond a "land of freedom", teach the Mond people some production skills and the ability to fly with the wings of the wind, and leave the power to the people of Mond. go.

After Barbatos left, some prominent groups or heroes in the uprising were recognized by the Mond people, and their descendants began to combine into several clans, rising to become the new noble class of Mond. At the beginning of the establishment of Mond City, the mistress of the Lawrence family, Fanny Larry, led the people to build a huge statue in the square to commemorate the god of wind, and left behind the statue to lead the leaders of various tribes to make a vow to protect Mond forever. . The Badminton Festival was also formed at this time as an event to commemorate the blessings of the Fengshen.

Under the mild climate created by Barbatos and pioneered by the Mond people, Mond agriculture developed rapidly. As a role model in the hearts of Mond people, the new nobles are greatly respected and loved. They also keep in mind their obligations and strict self-discipline when enjoying the high courtesy of the people. This harmony between nobles and commoners has shaped the cultural germination of Mond. For example, noble lords hunted together with their subjects, and when they returned with their prey, the nobles shared the results with all the subjects. This was a major festival in the territory, and the nobles also showed their strength and generosity.

However, with the passage of time, the life of the new aristocrats has become increasingly extravagant and corrupt, and the aristocrats have gradually forgotten their self-discipline based on moral responsibilities and regarded themselves as kings who were superior to ordinary people in the first place. Among the nobles, the Lawrence family has become the largest family and is the real ruler of Mond. Most of the other nobles are loyal to the Lawrence family while brutally suppressing the common people. The nobles headed by Lawrence used various methods to restrict the freedom of the common people. The church and court magisters also cooperated with the nobles to monopolize cultural knowledge to prevent the common people from understanding Mond’s past. Maintaining a hierarchical background, the statues on the square were replaced by towers, and became a symbol for the nobles to declare their power under the aristocratic autocracy. Commoners can only have limited entertainment during festivals, and Mond's famous literary masterpiece "Mond's Tower" reflects the fact that the church was the accomplice of the nobles' violent expropriation at that time. The corruption of the church also made some saints feel disappointed with the clergy, and went underground to propagate the original teachings to the common people. To a certain extent, the underground preaching maintained the continuation of the free faith of the Westwind Church. According to the "Gunhild Biography", during this period, the Gunhild family still did not forget the original oath, trying to maintain the balance between the nobles and the common people, and safeguard the interests of the common people to the greatest extent. The Emon Roca family has not been mentioned in the existing historical materials, and their whereabouts are unknown.

At least 1010 years ago, a Munata tribe was wandering on the land. When they were out of food for several days, they were attacked by the dragon Usa and were forced to flee to the city of Mond for shelter. Usa invaded Mond City, but at this time the swordsmanship had become a formality. The Mond nobles were powerless to resist, and chose to reach a compromise with Usa secretly. The nobles betrayed the Munata people to pay tribute to them, and Usa promised to ensure the safety of Mond City. . Vanessa was born in this tribe that had been reduced to slaves. As a child, Vanessa participated in gladiatorial competitions for the pleasure of the nobles, and achieved outstanding results in the arena.

The age of Vanessa has come to the end of the decadent aristocratic autocracy. Under the influence of the activities of underground organizations, more and more civilians are aware of their own situation, and the voice of resisting the aristocratic rule is rising. At the badminton festival when Vanessa was ten years old, Barbatos was awakened by the prayers of the oppressed Mond people. He came to Mond in the name of Wendy and was shocked by the current situation of Mond. At the badminton festival, Wendy ignored the nobility's pre-determined result and grabbed the badminton before the young master of the Lawrence family. She was wanted by the nobility and met Vanessa on the way to escape. Vanessa was arrested by the Lawrence family for covering Wendy. jail. Wendy sneaked into the prison at night and expressed to her that she hoped to help Vanessa and her tribe regain their freedom, but was rejected by Vanessa, but Vanessa agreed to be friends with Wendy. The next day, Buck Lawrence, then the supreme ruler of Mond, asked Vanessa and her tribe to defeat the dragon Usa in the arena in exchange for the freedom of the whole tribe, and promised Vanessa that if she really defeated the dragon, she would give Mond The status of the Lord of Virtue. Buck thought that it was impossible for Vanessa to defeat the magic dragon, so he only used this wrestling as a noble entertainment for the badminton festival. This unreasonable request aroused the anger of the nearby civilians, but Lawrence naturally turned a blind eye. At this time, Barbatos came in the form of a god, endowed Vanessa with the power to defeat the dragon, and successfully drove away the dragon Usa, horrified Lawrence and other nobles.

Vanessa took advantage of the opportunity to set off a harbinger of resistance to the aristocratic tyranny headed by the Lawrence family, and soon gained the support of the common people. Various underground rebels and organizations, including Legenfund, Kreuzred Lawrence, and the Gunnhild family They responded one after another, and Mond's second revolution broke out. During the revolution, Barbatos forged the "Secret Treaty of Leeward" in the name of the high-ranking nobles. In the secret treaty, the nobles betrayed the god of wind and sold everything about Mond to Morax. The content of the secret agreement made all Mond people feel betrayed, which greatly damaged the reputation of the nobles, and many soldiers under the nobles defected and surrendered one after another. After a long struggle, the rebels led by Vanessa won the revolution. The Mond nobles and the forces that did evil with the nobles were eventually expelled from the Mond area. The original court magister was also expelled because he failed to fulfill the duty of guiding the Mond nobles to good, but the intellectual heritage left by him is still used today.

After the victory of the revolution, Vanessa made several reforms to Mond. First of all, the superior social status of the nobles was abolished, in order to prevent similar tyrants from reappearing, secondly, the Knights of the West Wind was established and served as the first leader, called "Knights of the Lion's Tooth", the old church was reorganized into the Church of the West Wind and belonged to the Knights, and again Establish Mond's belief in freedom. The tall towers on the square were also torn down and rebuilt as statues of Fengshen. To commemorate this revolution, the Mond people formed the "wolf" of the north wind knights, the "lion" of the dandelion (lion tooth) knights, the "eagle" of the west wind knights, and the "wind dragon" of Twalin as "four". The tradition of guarding the wind.

500 years ago, a catastrophe occurred in Kanria, and a large number of monsters created by alchemy researcher Reindotter eroded the entire Tivat, known as the "dark beast tide". This catastrophe changed the fate of many people. Among them, the dragon Durin invaded Mond, and Alan Delin and Rustan, as the then head of the Zephyr Knights, led a large army to fight against the beast tide. Later, Rustan died on the way to fight against the catastrophe, which made Alan Delin very sad, and Alan Delin immediately announced his withdrawal from the Knights. The leaderless knights fell into hard battles and suffered huge losses, and it was difficult to resist the attack of the dragon Durin and the corrupted monsters. The prayer of the Mond people finally awakened the will of the wind god. Barbatos summoned Twarin, and Twarin and Doolin fought, bit off the throat of the poisonous dragon, and beheaded it in the Dragon's Back Snow Mountain, but Twarin also swallowed it. Durin's blood.

After the catastrophe in Kanria ended, Mond returned to the long-term peaceful state before the catastrophe. With the development of peace and the city of Mond, people's beliefs have also changed. The belief of the guardian of the four winds is gradually lost, and the corresponding temples abandoned.

Although Mond has encountered many incidents in recent years and once fell into a difficult situation, in the second five hundred years of the Zephyr Knights governing Mond, the area under the rule of the wind god has never succumbed to tyranny, and still sings the song of freedom. Song, welcome all respectable travelers from afar, and face cultural integration and changes with an inclusive attitude. May the wind of Mond's freedom blow forever.

The knight order that governs Mond City was established by Vanessa, who overthrew the old aristocratic rule a thousand years ago, and manages the size of Mond City. Mond's "Eagle of the West Wind" is responsible for maintaining the order of Mond City, and at the same time guarding the creed of "Freedom" in Mond City. Although he was called a knight, he was not conferred by anyone—the Knight of the West Wind was a title he could be proud of because he shouldered a noble responsibility.
The poets and singers of Mond City who are good at composing and reciting poems about heroes and their deeds or other stories and emotions. Often haunts plazas and taverns.

The dandelion wine produced in Mond is famous all over the world, and it is also the largest export industry in Mond. Alcohol plays an indispensable part in the life of Mond people, but people's love for wine has also brought a lot of trouble to public security.
It's been a lot of fun traveling with you.
Then don't you have to show some sincerity? Such as piety, love, or...

I want to write you into a new song! Hey, why do you show such an expression, are you worried that you won't be able to pay the manuscript fee? Haha, I don't want Mora, why not... tell me your story again! .
Come, sit here. I wrote a new poem, let's call it "Traveler's Wind".
Please help me get a drink. I'm sure I'll be very grateful to you, it's a deal.
If you come here like this, you should be beaten into the air, right?
Want to relax with some music? Capriccio, or Serenade?
There is no sweet water in your land, nor any delicious fruit. Not to mention good wine? Hehe, so I don't even want to go if you invite me. (condemns you)
Ha... I slept soundly. Hey, hello, we meet again. Um? don't remember me? Hey, let me join you on your journey again.
I love wine! And the wind! Well, it would be nice to have some wind-brewed wine here.
Your poems deserve to be sung by the best bard in the world!
Hey, do you want to go out? Take me one.
Well done, traveler. I want to hear, what is your wish?

my wish? Um. Before, I thought about traveling the whole world. It's the same now, but there is a limitation added, that is to be with you. With you, it is complete. The narrator really needs to be with the adventurer, hehe!
I have gained a lot, and I can exchange it for a few bottles of good wine.
Have you ever seen Cecilia Flower? It is a white wild flower that blooms silently only on the top of the quiet cliff. In my heart, it is the most beautiful flower in Tivat.
Hmm... If you want to go, give me an apple.
I want to travel the whole world, do you want to be together?

Mond characteristic building. Compared with the ancient Roman theater, there are extra [ICON_GreatMusician] great musician points and [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music slots. In a city with a tavern, for every [ICON_Citizen] population point, +1 [ICON_Faith] belief +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value, and plantations get an extra +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value.

Charm provides +1[ICON_Food] food and +1[ICON_Culture] culture for charming and above cells, charm provides +3[ICON_Faith] faith for amazing and above cells, and +1[ICON_Movement] movement for units owned , civilian units are free to enter foreign countries without open borders. Units are immune to hurricane damage, +4 [ICON_Power] for wind farms and offshore wind farms.

All [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writings and [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music add 4 [ICON_Faith] faith to the city, and get 300% [ICON_ThemeBonus] tourism performance. Has the additional unique unit bard. A bard can choose any available upgrade. [ICON_ThemeBonus] tourism performance obtained by spreading culture among the currently warring civilizations +100%.

Mond's characteristic heavy cavalry unit has an independent upgrade tree, and its [ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness will gradually increase with the unlocking of municipalities (divine right, divine right of kings, ideology, cold war). However, as the number of units trained increases, its selling price will increase.
A cheaper cultural spread unit unlocked by Enlightenment civics that replaces Rock Bands, but does not benefit from the policy cards with Rock Band bonuses.

Citizens can improve mountain tiles, mountains provide +2 [ICON_Production] production, frozen soil and snow have the same output as plains (tundra provides +1 [ICON_Production] production, snow provides +1 [ICON_Production] production +1 [ICON_Food] food). Non-wonder buildings with [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writing or [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music slots give +1 charm to the city's plot.

The recruited rock band initially has the [ICON_Promotion] promotion of religious rock, and it only takes half the usual time to build the Holy Land and Theater Square area. Has an additional unique unit, Priest Priest, replacing Guru.

The tavern provides an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic slot, and the city where the tavern is located has +20% [ICON_Faith] Faith. Has an additional unique unit, the Sister of the Crown of Thorns, which replaces the Inquisitor.
Provides additional recovery to nearby units within 1 cell. Units adjacent to the praying priest have +15 [ICON_Religion] religious combat power.
If the Sister of the Crown of Thorns dies in a Theology battle, a relic will spawn. +10 [ICON_Religion] Religious Combat Power when fighting Theological Combat in the country's borders.
Provides additional recovery to nearby units within 1 cell. Units adjacent to Priests have increased religious combat power.

If the Sister of the Crown of Thorns dies in a Theology battle, a relic will spawn. [ICON_Religion] Religious combat power is lower, but [ICON_Religion] Religious combat power is doubled when fighting theological battles in the country's borders.
Units adjacent to the praying priest have +15 [ICON_Religion] religious combat power.

He is not only the praying pastor of Westwind Church, but also the shining idol of Mond City. For Mond, who is used to traditional bards, "idol" is a new thing that he is not used to. But in Mond, everyone loves Barbara. Such is the free spirit of the Free City--so gratefully Barbara sums it up for all the favors.

Rosalia - a nun affiliated with the West Wind Church in Mond City. Except for weird nuns who don't look like priests in any way. Cold, sharp, a woman as sharp as a blade. Unpredictable whereabouts, often leave without saying goodbye. Has a mission, but people don't seem to understand what she represents...
The most amazing magic is real effort.
choir? I'm sorry, I don't participate in church activities, and don't look for me when I work overtime
The maverick Rosalia is simply a church figure. But please don't forget: if there is black, there will be corresponding white; where there is light, there must be shadow

Barbara is the Priest of the Zephyr Knights. She heals wounds with water elements, and soothes people's tired hearts with singing. In the hearts of the Monds, Barbara possesses magical magic that can heal the patient's body and mind—and in Barbara's heart, this magic is called "practical effort."
As the demon god Barbatos has the ability to use mountains and blow away ice and snow.

Mond, led by the demon god Barbatos, is a civilization that focuses on culture and beliefs. He uses taverns and broadcasting centers to create high-charm plots, and recruits more naturalists from the beliefs brought by the bonuses of taverns. Construct national parks in mountainous and high-attraction land to obtain high tourism performance and more easily obtain cultural victories.
Barbara is a devout pastor of the Zephyr church more likely to win religious victories

As a praying priest, Barbara has a unique unit, praying priests. Using the characteristics of civilization and the high amount of faith produced in characteristic building taverns, recruit more praying priests to provide high religious combat power bonuses for religious battles. . When Rock Band can be recruited, use Religious Rock's ability to take down a Religious Victory in one fell swoop
Rosalia uses the advantages of religion and belief while using relics to accumulate tourism performance

Rosalia, who walks in the dark night, guards the young and ancient city. The characteristic unit, the Sister of the Crown of Thorns, can sweep away the religious forces that do not belong to Mond, and maintains an absolute advantage in super-high religious battles in the country. The relics left by the Sister of the Crown of Thorns' death, combined with the additional relic slot, make it easier to obtain tourism performance .

In the end, the tyrant fell and the boy died in battle. Wendy gains power to become the new god, Barbatos the Demon God. Andreus, the demon god who has been fighting with Dekarapian, also chose to leave because of his own characteristics. The Demon God War ended, and the Demon God Barbatos became the God of Wind, one of the seven rulers in the world. Walking in Mond City as a bard, I found that the atmosphere in the city was extremely depressing. On the day of the Badminton Festival, I played "Song of the Wind", which has not been played for a long time, to an Apple vendor, and was warned by the vendor, "Don't touch that shuttlecock." During the celebration, I found out about the absurd and brutal behavior of the nobleman, stepped forward to snatch the badminton to play with the nobleman, was chased and killed by the soldiers, met Vanessa on the way to escape, and got her cover. Vanessa was arrested for offending the nobles. Wendy got the cell key that night and entered the cell to talk to Vanessa. Wendy wants to escape Mund with Vanessa and her people. But Vanessa said that her people have forgotten the meaning of "freedom", and they have to participate in the duel on the second day anyway to awaken the people's sense of resistance and freedom, otherwise they will only be shackled by another power. .

The next day, the nobles shamelessly drove all the Vanessa clan out of the city, demanding that they defeat the dragon Uzzah, and shot and killed the retreating people with arrows. At this time, Wendy suddenly appeared, guided the power of the wind to make Vanessa hit the dragon, and used divine power to order the dragon to retreat. At this time, Wendy asked to write Vanessa into the poem, and was agreed, saying that this would be a new chapter with the Vanessa family as the protagonist. In the end, Lawrence was asked to follow the rules and hand over control of Mond. In addition, by forging Morax's signature to create the "Secret Treaty of Leeward", a large number of soldiers rebelled, and together with Vanessa, they overthrew the aristocratic rule. The followers of the wind god Barbatos form the Guardians of the Four Winds. Fengshen left again.

500 years ago, all the gods, including the god of wind, came together and destroyed Kerriya. The Calamity of Kerriya spread throughout Teyvat. The dragon Durin and the dark wave of monsters attacked Mond together, and the Zephyr Knights fought hard. Fengshen and his family member Twalin fought against Dulin together, and finally cut Dulin off the snow mountain. The wind god and the wind dragon corrupted by the poisonous blood of the dragon fell into a deep sleep.

His father, Simon Page, is the bishop of the Westwind Church, known as the "Cardinal of the Dawn". His mother, Frederica, comes from the Gunnhild family, and her sister, Qin, is the pride of the family. Barbara can't surpass it only by hard work people. The parents' marriage split and they went their separate ways, with Barbara following her father and Jean following her mother. Stimulated by a little competitive spirit, Barbara tried to catch up with her sister in swordsmanship, but after realizing that she was not good at fighting, Barbara chose to be in charge of logistics. Under the guidance of his father, he became a healer.
Influenced by Alice, Barbara has now become an idol in Mond City. Currently, my father is traveling with the head of the north wind knight Falga.

Born in a mountain village, he was taken away by a group of bandits who slaughtered the village, and trained as a thief and a servant. She was discovered by the old thief who captured her during a sneak escape, and the old thief asked Rosalia to duel with him in exchange for the chance to leave. Rosalia was victorious, granted the Eye of God, and accepted into the band of thieves. A few years later, the Thieves Group was wiped out by the Zephyr Knights. Because she was young, Rosalia was considered to have room for repentance. She was brought back to Mond by the head of the group, Falga, and was incorporated into the Zephyr Church as a nun to study. Skipping class. Later, he secretly handled the danger for Mond, but still attached to the Westwind Church, which always broke the hearts of Sister Victoria and Barbara.
Don't force yourself, you can call me if you have any difficulties.
If one day you encounter a problem that cannot be solved. Maybe I'll solve the problem for you.
Don't force yourself, you can call me if you have any difficulties.
Who knows? Everything always has two sides.
pray. Not for God or anyone else, but for yourself.
Would you like a drink? This is the dandelion wine of the year, and it tastes very good.
I think we share similar tastes in many ways.
A slick, hypocritical and cunning person. You threatened Mond. (condemns you)
Get your work done and enjoy every day. Isn't that what Mond's life is like?
This believer, if you have troubles that are difficult to solve, you can come to me.
Skip the pleasantries. I'm here to get work done.
Do you need help? I have time now.
Is there anyone or something you want to deal with? I can do a little favor, just don't tell anyone else.
...but there are some good ones too.
This is not my area of ​​interest.
God may protect everyone, but He won't do it. Otherwise, human suffering becomes a joke.
It's okay, not too much trouble.
Alas, nothing but trouble is trouble.
My wish is to bring smiles to everyone around me! As long as I can help you, I will be very happy.
If only I could help everyone.
Please accept it! Wait for the next new song, I will sing it to you as soon as possible!
Leave the treatment to me, you won't be disappointed!
If you become an idol too, I will definitely support you with all my strength.
I will work hard to be worthy of your trust...
Do you like spicy small dried fish? I have two more here...here, here's one for you!
Thank you for accompanying me to the present, I am getting closer and closer to my dream. Please take care of me in the days to come~
I don't like it very much.
Eh? ask me? Well... Anyway, it's just a second.
Everyone will have their own wishes.
